main event: A bright red light, the size of a man's head, was observed hovering in Inglis, Florida, during August-September 1954.
interesting points: The sighting occurred several times between 3-6 AM over a span of 3 to 4 weeks., The observation lasted for about 15 minutes each time., The object was sighted about 15 miles south of the Florida Power Plant near the mouth of a river., Conditions were calm and slightly foggy during the sightings., Observers for the sighting were employees of the Florida Power and the reliability of their experiences was unknown.
